extensionDescription.message: Change every web page style, darken background color and brighten font color, prevent users see high brightness web page.

selectDomainDescription.message: Users can use different settings for each domain.

cantAccessText.message: Because browser restriction,this add-on can not work in this domain.

goGlobalSettingText.message: Click here go to global setting page

reloadText.message: If change setting, need reload page to apply new setting.

changeColorFlag_description.message: Turn on this option to darken background color and brighten font color.

imgBrightness_description.message:
Turn down this value to decrease image brightness.
'1' is 'keep original brightness', '0' is darkest(full black).

bgImgBrightness_description.message:
Turn down this value to decrease background image brightness.
'1' is 'keep original brightness','0' is darkest(full black).

minFontSize_description.message:
If font size smaller than this value(px), font size will be enlarged to this value Size(px).(also enlarge line-height and element height)
NOTICE!This option is NOT suitable for some web site.
If trun ON this option, 'changing style speed' will be slower.

runTaskQuantityAt1Time.message: Quantity of 'change style elements' at one time
